options.content:
# !!! WARNING !!!

The panels in this section will be empty if you didn't enable RocksDB metrics. RocksDB metrics have some overhead on Besu Performance. Please check this PR [#4038](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/4038) for more details.

To enable RocksDB metrics, you should add these config options to your besu command : 
***--metrics-protocol=PROMETHEUS --metrics-category=JVM,PROCESS,BLOCKCHAIN,ETHEREUM,EXECUTORS,NETWORK,PEERS,KVSTORE_ROCKSDB,KVSTORE_ROCKSDB_STATS,PRUNER,RPC,SYNCHRONIZER,TRANSACTION_POOL,STRATUM***

targets.legendFormat: block cache data hit ratio - instance {{instance}}
